Thank you so much, Ciaran for such an amazing course… It’s well structured, very informative, and easy to understand. Again thank you! – Eva


Plus a whole host of others...

===========================================


Blogging can be so much fun, even better when you are profiting from it.


And that is what I'm going to show you how to do...


To build a 24/7 money machine, that you can create and grow from anywhere in the world you are…


1. Follow along as I build a professional-looking blog from scratch, even though I'm not a designer,

2. Get a never-ending stream of blog content ideas,

3. Get floods of free visitors from the search engines, and...

4. Turn your passion into a fun and profitable online venture.

==============================================

But what if you’re not qualified?


Here’s the truth about starting a new blog…

1. You don’t need to be an expert,

2. You don’t need to have done this before to create great content and get floods of visitors,

3. You don’t need to be a university graduate, or college, or even high school…

4. And, you don’t need to spend thousands of dollars to make this a reality, (This really is KEY FOR THIS TRAINING)


WHY TAKE THIS BLOGGING COURSE AND NOT ANOTHER ONE?


Well, this blogging training is based on a blog strategy that works, and that I use in my own businesses. Also, the more you do with this, the stronger your blog will become.


You see,


This blogging training focuses on great research, SEO (Search Engine Optimization) and Content Creation.

Vs.

What many people teach, just simply following your passion and people will come... THAT DOESN'T WORK! 


For a start... if you just simply create content, you don't even know whether anyone is looking for that type of content, and 9 times out of 10, THEY AREN'T!


Non Targeted Blog Content = No Visitors


Plus…

Did you know?


When people are searching on Google they are most likely looking for a solution to a problem that they have...


When your Blog appears they are actually actively looking for the solution you are offering,


Your blog just means so much more to them...


When we know how to find out these problems, we make much better FOCUSED blog content.


Better Focus = MORE VISITORS = RETURN VISITORS = A GROWING BLOG!


If you have fallen for the gurus before, don’t worry, many of my students have been in the same predicament before they came to me.


So, for a change, you will learn the real fundamentals of how Google works, for YOU and YOUR BLOG!


The skills and strategies haven’t changed since marketing began.


These are the things that actually WILL work for you, no matter the niche you want to be in, and in a much quicker time.


Do you want to get real results for a change?


You will be able to easily follow along with the over-the-shoulder step-by-step approach to help this become a reality for you…


Simply do what I do, and let me guide you to succeeding online.


==============================================

How This Blog Marketing Training works


The training is split into 7 Modules:


Part 1 – Finding Your Passion - Correct Blogging Procedure


This is all about you and your niche, and your passion, but also...

· Finding out what niches people make money in,

· How it will work for you,

· How to get to the core of what you want to create,

· How to find the perfect blog name... sometimes this can be the hardest point, but it is a breeze with this method.


I’ll show you how to pick the perfect blog niche, with a simple 5-minute exercise, ready to be plucked up by you and used to create your first blog, and your first monthly revenue.


Part 2 – Setting Up Your First Profitable Website

We get straight into your blog creation now...


You will follow along step by step as I bring you through the whole blogging website setup, from:


  1. Purchasing your first domain,

  2. Getting your hosting set up,

  3. Your website created,

  4. Your required settings all finished,

  5. Your plugins added,

When done correctly following this specific optimization formula, you will get an unfair advantage, and create:


  • Extremely strong audience targeted high converting blog,

  • That is easily findable by your customer or buyer,

  • That the search engines love,

  • And that is an automatic machine that brings in more and more visitors and sales the longer it is active.

You will get addicted to creating these blog websites, and the more you create the better and easier they will become. I can get them set up now, in about 1 hour from start to finish (not all the content obviously).


And when you follow along, build yours out and learn the process, you will be able to do it too, but you need to learn it first.


Part 3 - Finding Your Audience - Getting This Right Is Key To Success

Following on from the blog website creation section, imagine you could unwrap the secrets to make your website or blog instantly resonate with not only Google but also your target audience.


A little-known formula that makes the search engines think that your website is the best in your chosen niche...

And your target audience flood to your site, even if you are brand new.


You will be finding what is part of the NOOR Strategy.

A keyword list of terms that you will be crafting your content around that Google and the other search engines have...


No Other Option but to Rank you high in the search engines, even if you are completely new...

This is where your blogging power-up starts to happen!

Without this,

You won't be creating great content for people who actually want to read it, and if you don't have this...


Well, you have a Dead Blog.


Part 4 - Creating Blog Content Easily - That Rocks!


Content is King as they say...


But, while it might be king, and it is that important, it is a learned skill...


It is not something that you automatically get good at!


BUT...


What if you could Short Cut that skill acquirement?


What if I was able to show you how to...


1. Know exactly what type of content to create for your audience ALWAYS,

2. Know the exact steps you need to take to create perfectly structured content for the search engines and your readers,

3. How to create this amazing content, EVEN if you suck at actually writing,

4. How to blow your readers away with Headlines that 20-year blogging veterans would be proud of...


Would that make you happy?


Well, that's what I have in store for you in the content section... pure novice to GOLD EXPERT instruction... YOU WILL BE BLOWN AWAY!


Part 5 - Making Money With Your Blog - The Fun Stuff

When it comes to selling online, you need to understand what you can sell...


But most importantly, what your visitors actually want...


This section is all about making money with your blog, and we will cover:


1. All about affiliate marketing

2. What affiliate marketing actually is,

3. How it will work for you,

4. What you will be POTENTIALLY promoting,

5. How you will get paid for what you do,


But not only that, how to find the right industry, company, products or services, and partnerships to promote, in any niche, using the power of Google to help you find them.


I’ll show you how to find thousands of products and brands with a simple search, ready to be plucked up by you and used to create monthly blogging revenue.


You'll also uncover:


How to look at affiliate products and programs to know whether they are good or bad,


And in addition, you will KNOW if that product will sell well for you or not.


This is the real foundational base of what bloggers do to make money, so you can understand how and why you will make money with blogging.



Part 6 - Advanced Blogging - Email Marketing

Once you have gotten here well done. You are onto the first Module of The Advanced Blogging Section


With everything that you have learned so far, you can have a fully functioning and long-term sustainable blogging business created...


But, imagine being able to take everything you have done and then inject it with turbo fuel.


Well, that is what email marketing does.


It turns your blogging site into a money-printing machine due to the power of what is called permission marketing. You get permission to send people affiliate offers anytime you want!


You will unlock how to:

  • How to set up and manage your email software,

  • Craft engaging email marketing emails,

  • Build up your first indoctrination email sequence (you get the templates),

  • Create your subscriber grabbing squeeze pages (which gathers your client's email address),

  • And bridge pages (which helps you convert more visitors into sales), but not only that…

  • You'll discover the keys to the beautifully cunning ethical bribe.

The Ethical Bribe is used to convince people to give you their email address. You create it in such a way that the person who sees it would be silly to turn down your offer.


You do all of the above, so you can sell (and provide value) to your customers for the lifetime they are on your email list.


One Email Subscriber Can Mean Multiple Sales Over Their Lifetime.


Now consider the average value of 1 subscriber on an email list equals $1 Per Month.


Now imagine if you had 5,000 or 10,000 subscribers.


Part 7 - Advanced Blogging - Keyword Capturing

Now we already covered the keywords above...


But this part of the training is for those of us who like to add a touch of stardust to the proceedings...


The skills you will learn in this section will:


1. Enable you to find a never-ending stream of visitor hungry questions just waiting for you to create content for,

2. Allow you to dominate your specific niche by answering the topics that are key to accelerated blog growth,

3. And give your blog the critical top positions in the search engines which practically guarantee huge blog growth,


And...

You don't need fancy software that costs you an arm and a leg, no paid websites, crazy tools, and no pulling your hair out (well maybe just a bit)...


Important Note: While many people will get this up and running quickly, this training is NOT a get-rich-quick scheme and not an overnight solution.


You will have to put in the work to make this happen, you will have to watch the videos and take action on what I say. But, if you can do this, I will guide you through all the things you need to build your first successful blog online.


If you can...

Follow the easy step-by-step training videos, YOU WILL get your first fully functional blogging business up and running and producing income in super quick time.


With Over 12 Hours Of Easily Actionable Lessons and downloads,

· I walk you through every detail, step by step,

· So you get the same results as if I was doing it for you.

On top of that, if you ever get stuck, don’t worry, help is at hand.

Because once you become a student of this training course, you will receive continuous support from me – for a lifetime.

I will share my advice and answers to your questions whenever you need help from me (please give me time to respond though).


So...

1. If you are looking for super straightforward instructional training that won’t have you pulling your hair out,

2. And most importantly, a proven strategy to get started with blogging in the easiest way possible, that cuts the learning curve and just gives you the actionable no fluff strategy you need,

3. If this is what you are after…then I look forward to welcoming you into our tight and happy community.

I look forward to seeing you on the inside, helping you start your blogging journey the right way right away, and achieving the results that are going to turn your life around.


Dedicated to your success


Ciaran Doyle

courseDetails.title: Professional Diploma in Social Media Marketing & Copywriting
courseDetails.shortDescription: Professional Diploma in Social Media Marketing, Management & Copywriting, Business Writing by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Diploma in Social Media Marketing, Management & Copywriting, Business Writing by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and resident of the incubator "The Fintech House of Portugal".

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


Social Media Marketing & Management:


Social Media Marketing (SMM):

Social Media Marketing is a form of digital marketing that utilizes social media platforms to promote products, services, or brands. It involves creating and sharing content on social media networks to engage with a target audience, increase brand awareness, and drive website traffic. SMM encompasses various activities such as posting text and image updates, videos, and other content that sparks user engagement.


Social Media Management:

Social Media Management involves the strategic planning, monitoring, and execution of a company's social media marketing efforts. It includes tasks like creating content calendars, responding to comments and messages, analyzing performance metrics, and adjusting strategies based on data.


Copywriting and Business Writing:


Copywriting:

Copywriting is the art and science of writing persuasive and compelling content with the goal of influencing the reader to take a specific action, such as making a purchase or signing up for a service. Copywriting is prevalent in advertising, marketing, and sales materials, including websites, brochures, email campaigns, and more.


Business Writing:

Business writing is a broader term that includes various types of written communication within a business context. This encompasses emails, reports, proposals, memos, and other documents used for internal and external communication. Effective business writing is clear, concise, and tailored to the audience, conveying information in a professional manner.


Importance for Companies and Managers:


Enhanced Communication:

Social media marketing and management skills enable companies to communicate directly with their audience, fostering brand loyalty and customer satisfaction.

Proficient business writing ensures effective communication within and outside the organization, reducing misunderstandings and promoting a professional image.


Brand Building:

Social media is a powerful tool for brand building. Effective SMM can enhance brand visibility and reputation, leading to increased trust and credibility.

Quality copywriting contributes to a consistent brand voice across various platforms, reinforcing the brand's identity and values.


Customer Engagement:

Social media management allows companies to engage with their audience in real-time, addressing concerns, gathering feedback, and building a community around the brand.

Engaging copywriting is crucial for creating content that resonates with the target audience, increasing the likelihood of interaction and conversion.


Marketing Effectiveness:

Social media platforms provide targeted advertising options. Knowing how to leverage these tools through SMM enhances the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.

Well-crafted copywriting in marketing materials maximizes the impact of promotional efforts, leading to higher conversion rates and ROI.


Career Development and Business Success:


Versatility:

Learning social media marketing, management, copywriting, and business writing equips professionals with versatile skills applicable across various industries and roles.


Competitive Edge:

Professionals who master these skills have a competitive advantage in the job market. Companies value employees who can effectively communicate, market products, and manage social media presence.


Entrepreneurial Success:

For entrepreneurs, these skills are crucial for establishing and promoting their own businesses. Effective communication and marketing strategies can significantly contribute to business success.


Adaptability:

In a rapidly evolving digital landscape, individuals who continuously enhance their skills in these areas demonstrate adaptability and are better positioned for career growth and business development.


The solid understanding of social media marketing, management, copywriting, and business writing is invaluable for companies and managers. It not only facilitates effective communication but also contributes to brand building, marketing success, and overall career development. In the dynamic business environment, these skills are instrumental in staying competitive and achieving long-term success.
targetAudiences: For anybody who want to build career at Marketing, Public Relations and Advertising

courseDetails.longDescription:
Pursue Top 1% Career 3.0 - The #1 BEST-SELLING Career Success Course! (with over 250 ratings)


>> COURSE REGULARLY UPDATED (Last updated: JUNE 2024): NEW TIPS, MORE LESSONS <<

>> CERTIFIED COACH, SPEAKER, AND TRAINER <<

>> OVER 346,000 STUDENTS IN TOTAL <<


Are you not able to convert job interviews into job offers? Or your appraisals into promotions?

Do you have all of the required qualifications, yet are not able to create an unforgettable impression?

Are you looking for a key that will unlock success in your life?


What if I tell you that except YOU, nothing else matters when it comes to YOUR success?

Did you know, that people remember you the way you make them feel instead of the words that you actually said? So, if you want to create an unforgettable first impression, it is very important that you prepare yourself with the correct tools and techniques before you even meet the person in question whom you want to impress or go to the event/interview.


I have asked this one question to the many decision-makers all over the world "If you would like to see the change that will make your organization more productive, what would it be?"


And everybody came back with one word and they said ATTITUDE. If people had a better disposition, they would have better team coordination, quality would go up, the bottom line would go up, and obviously, success is bound to follow.

courseDetails.title: मास्टरिंग इंट्राडे Option Trading
courseDetails.shortDescription: Proven Strategies for Profitable Day Trading
courseDetails.longDescription:
Course Name: मास्टरिंग इंट्राडे ऑप्शन ट्रेडिंग: Proven Strategies for Profitable Day Trading

Instructor: Rajiv LB Roy


इंट्राडे ऑप्शन ट्रेडिंग पर हमारे व्यापक पाठ्यक्रम में आपका स्वागत है! यदि आप ऑप्शंस मार्केट में डे ट्रेडिंग की पूरी क्षमता को अनलॉक करना चाहते हैं, तो आप सही जगह पर हैं।


इस पाठ्यक्रम में, हम इंट्राडे ट्रेडिंग की तेज़ गति वाली दुनिया में लाभ को अधिकतम करने और जोखिमों को कम करने में मदद करने के लिए डिज़ाइन की गई शक्तिशाली रणनीतियों की एक श्रृंखला में तल्लीन हैं।


हम विभिन्न विषयों को कवर करते हैं, जिनमें शामिल हैं:

  1. Intraday Short Straddle on Stock Options: Discover how to effectively execute a short straddle strategy to benefit from theta decay just before the options expiry day.

  2. Secret Pair Trading Strategy through Stock Options: Learn a unique approach to pair trading using stock options, enabling you to capitalize on market inefficiencies.

  3. Intraday RSI Strategy: Explore how to utilize the Relative Strength Index (RSI) indicator for intraday trading, identifying overbought and oversold conditions for profitable trades.

  4. Momentum Trading Strategy through Options: Harness the power of momentum trading in the options market, exploiting short-term price trends for potential quick gains.

  5. Bull Put Spread Intraday Strategy: Understand how to construct and implement a bull put spread strategy to take advantage of bullish market conditions.

  6. Bear Call Spread Intraday Strategy: Learn how to use a bear call spread to profit from bearish market scenarios while managing risk effectively.

  7. Contra Trading Strategy: Gain insights into contra trading, a strategy that involves taking positions opposite to prevailing market trends to potentially benefit from reversals.

  8. Iron Fly on Bank Nifty Intraday Strategy: Explore the intricacies of the iron fly strategy and its application specifically in intraday trading on Bank Nifty.

  9. Iron Condor Intraday Strategy on Bank Nifty: Discover how to construct and execute an iron condor strategy specifically tailored for intraday trading on Bank Nifty etc.


पूरे पाठ्यक्रम के दौरान, हम इंट्राडे ऑप्शन ट्रेडिंग की जटिलताओं को सफलतापूर्वक नेविगेट करने में आपकी मदद करने के लिए गहन स्पष्टीकरण, वास्तविक जीवन के उदाहरण और व्यावहारिक सुझाव प्रदान करते हैं। इसके अतिरिक्त, हम हिंदी में इंट्राडे ट्रेडिंग पर मार्गदर्शन प्रदान करते हैं, विचार करने योग्य इंट्राडे स्टॉक को हाइलाइट करते हैं, और संभावित ट्रेडिंग अवसरों की कुशलता से पहचान करने के लिए आपको स्टॉक स्क्रीनर्स से परिचित कराते हैं।


चाहे आप एक मजबूत नींव बनाने की शुरुआत कर रहे हों या एक अनुभवी ट्रेडर जो अपने कौशल को निखारने की कोशिश कर रहे हों, यह कोर्स आपको इंट्राडे ऑप्शन ट्रेडिंग में उत्कृष्टता प्राप्त करने के लिए ज्ञान और उपकरणों से लैस करता है। अभी नामांकन करें और अपने व्यापार को नई ऊंचाइयों पर ले जाएं!

Good Luck!
